main.name: Bingling Dong
main.bio: An optimistic, organized, motivated, reliable Software Engineer that is capable of adapting new concepts quickly.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

work.title: Technology Analyst
work.description:
System of Records that stores customer offers, insights and profiles related data. Provides Restful APIs to create, update, and retrieve data in JSON format. Handles over 100 million calls daily. 
 - Redesgined and refactored legacy services in modern technology and best coding practice. Greatly increased readability and improved performance. 
 - Developed new feature/service to support new projects. 
 - Explored POCs of new technologies for performance optimization. 
 - Maintained services and provided production support. 

Skills: Java 1.8, Spring Boot, Maven, Oracle SQL, MVC, Design Patterns, Mockito, Jenkins, Ansible, IBM Message Queue, Kafka, ReactJS, Javascript, AutoSys, Datastage, Agile

work.company: Bank of America - Customer Incentive System
work.title: Technology Analyst
work.description:
Bank internal web application that provides a stream-lined enrollment process for small business account owners to get cash incentives through front-line associates. Saves over $4 million dollars. 
 - Worked on ADA compliance for the application. 
 - Developed new feature to support new projects. 
 - Maintained services and provided production support. 

Skills: Angular 2, Javascript, Java, Spring, Oracle SQL, Agile

work.title: Database and Web Support - Student Assistant
work.description:
Maintain and update Computer Science Department websites for the University. Daily tasks include updating, debugging, and upgrading new features. 

Skills: LAMP, Drupal 7, Perl, JavaScript, HTML, CSS. 
Example sites: https://www.cs.stonybrook.edu, https://ai.stonybrook.edu

work.title: Fund. of Software Development, Object-Oriented Programming
work.description: Daily tasks include holding six office hours per week. Related programming languages and techniques: Java, JavaScript, React, Database, MVC and other design patterns.

work.title: E-Board
work.description: Lead and plan community service projects and volunteer works for Stony Brook University and the communities around it

work.title: Orientation Leader
work.description: Lead International students through the Orientation Week.
